title: After yesterday i updated my client then this happened today
body: I was on vacation for 2 weeks so i did not update or touch my client till i came back. Then all was good after my update yesterday and everything runs fine. Till today when i wanna play it, then my laptop said it cannot find the shortcut even when i always put it on my deskstop but the League icon is now blank.

replies.body:
This is such a clickbait title!  x.x  The legacy client retired, so there may have been a hiccup during the update.  Try the following steps and let me know if that fixes the issue for you:

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

I hope that helps!
